author: Harrison Harper
comment: This watchface is one of the best it runs so smoothly and doesn't drain the battery to much which of me is a big deal. I would definitely pick this one up
title: Where do I start

author: Ruhan Salam
comment: Brilliant Watch Face, plus I got it for free thanks to their instagram code giveaway! Not much more I could ask for!
title: THANKS!

author: Ben Blincoe
comment: Needs some more customisation options. The red band around it is a little weird...
title: Not bad
